de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.graphic.netgraphics.attributes

类 Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.graphic.netgraphics.attributes.AbstractAttribute
      • de.uni.freiburg.iig.telematik.sepia.graphic.netgraphics.attributes.Line

  • public class Line
extends AbstractAttribute

    The line attribute class can define a color, a shape, a style, and a width. It is used by places, transitions, pages, annotations and arcs.

    作者:
    Adrian Lange

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  Line.Shape
      Enumeration to set the shape of the line
      static class  Line.Style
      Enumeration to set the line style

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_COLOR
      Default color as CSS2 color string
      static Line.Shape DEFAULT_SHAPE
      Default line shape
      static Line.Style DEFAULT_STYLE
      Default line style
      static double DEFAULT_WIDTH
      Default width of the line

    • 构造器概要

      Creates new line attribute with default values.

        width - Width of the line
